name: 5 Seconds or Less (1 hour game jam 170)
name_original: 5 Seconds or Less (1 hour game jam 170)
description:
This is a game I created in one hour for the 170th one hour game jam. The theme of the jam was 5 seconds.

To play you simply use the mouse to click the targets before they disappear. They count down for 5 seconds and if not clicked will give you a miss. 3 misses and the game ends.
